title: 93/200/EEC: Commission Decision of 10 March 1993 approving the programme for the eradication of Aujeszky' s disease in Luxembourg
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 10 March 1993 approving the programme for the eradication of Aujeszky's disease in Luxembourg
(93/200/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme for the eradication of Aujeszky's disease from Luxembourg is hereby approved for a period of three years.
Luxembourg shall bring into force by 15 March 1993 the laws, regulations and administrative provisions for implementing the programme referred to in Article 1.
This Decision shall enter into force on 15 March 1993.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 March 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No 121, 29. 7. 1964, p. 1977/64.
(2) OJ No L 268, 14. 9. 1992, p. 54.
